p.s: A compilation of brief news reports for

s.hi: If you believe any of these stories deserves more in-depth coverage , feel free to write a full article on the issues raised .

p.s:
No injuries were suffered when two bombs were exploded in
Londonderry
,
Northern Ireland
by Republican dissidents .
A coded message was received by the police half an hour before they were detonated in streets around the city 's main shopping centre .

Police Service of Northern Ireland Superintendent Stephen Martin has described the attacks as " cowardly and callous " , and said that the city centre will remain sealed off to allow for the search for other devices and forensic evidence .

item.s:
"
Bombs detonate in suspected IRA attack in Londonderry
" —
The Telegraph
, January 20 , 2012

"
Security tight after two bombs explode in Londonderry
" —
BBC News Online
, January 20 , 2012

p.s:
has filed for Chapter 11
bankruptcy
in order to complete its transformation from its traditional wet film business , with which it made its name , into a specialist digital printing company .
The move would allow the company to sell off assets to pay off pension liabilities and creditors .

item.s:
"
Kodak Bankruptcy May Shed Photography , Bet on Digital Printing
" —
Bloomberg
, January 20 , 2012

"
Eastman Kodak files for bankruptcy protection
" —
BBC News Online
, January 20 , 2012

head.s: Republican contender Newt Gingrich refutes open marriage accusations

p.s: refutes claims by his second wife , Marianne Ginther , that he demanded that they have an open marriage so that he could continue an affair with Callista Bisek , who later became his third wife .

The accusations , aired on ABC News on Thursday , come just before the Republican party 's
South Carolina
presidential primary .

If true , the allegations would mean Gingrich was having an affair whilst pillorying President
Bill Clinton
over his involvement with Monica Lewinsky .

item.s:
"
US Election 2012 : Newt Gingrich 's ex-wife Marianne gives ' explosive ' interview
" —
The Telegraph
, January 20 , 2012

"
Gingrich rips into media , then his rivals , in GOP debate
" —
Los Angeles Times
, January 20 , 2012

head.s: Dolce & Gabbana make apology over Hong Kong photography ban

p.s:
Italian luxury goods brand
Dolce & Gabbana
has issued an apology over its ban on Hong Kong citizens taking photographs of its shopfront in
Hong Kong
, even when taken from a public sidewalk .
The ban enforced by its security guards against locals but not mainland Chinese and foreigners infuriated locals , who have staged a number of protests against the retailer .

Photography from a public place of subjects normally visible from that place is legal in Hong Kong , and the local government has been condemned for not confronting Dolce & Gabbana , leaving things to protesters to bring about the apology .

item.s:
"
Dolce & Gabbana Apologizes for Photo Spat
" —
The Wall Street Journal
, January 19 , 2012

"
D&G gives in to HK protesters ' demands for apology
" —
CBS News
, January 18 , 2012

head.s: Magnitude 6.1 earthquake strikes New Zealand , no damage reported

p.s:
An earthquake of magnitude 6.1 struck
South Island
,
New Zealand
yesterday .

The epicenter was located off the coast about 204 kilometers west of
Invercargill
at a depth of 18 kilometers .
The earthquake struck late in the day local time .

No damage or injuries were reported and no alerts were issued by the
Pacific Tsunami Warning Center
.
An aftershock measuring 5.2 magnitude hit the area two hours later .

An earthquake measuring 6.3 magnitude hit
Christchurch
last year , killing over 180 people .

There may be as many as 15,000 shocks per year in New Zealand , which is on the "
Ring of Fire
" .

item.s:
. "
Strong earthquake strikes off New Zealand
" —
The Times of India
, January 19 , 2012

"
6.1-magnitude quake strikes off N Zealand
" —
Hindustan Times
, January 19 , 2012
